use.js(2,19): error TS2307: Cannot find module './mod' or its corresponding type declarations.


==== use.js (1 errors) ====
    /// <reference path='./types.d.ts'/>
    var mod = require('./mod');
                      ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module './mod' or its corresponding type declarations.
    var a = new mod.A()
    var b = new mod.B()
    a.m('nope')
    b.m('not really')
    
==== types.d.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare function require(name: string): any;
    declare var exports: any;
==== mod.js (0 errors) ====
    /// <reference path='./types.d.ts'/>
    var A = function A() {
        this.a = 1
    }
    var B = function B() {
        this.b = 2
    }
    exports.A = A
    exports.B = B
    A.prototype = B.prototype = {
        /** @param {number} n */
        m(n) {
            return n + 1
        }
    }
